data.title: Amer Bakery Hut
data.text:
Awsm food and well managed staff..... Vry gud place for variety of food.... A perfect taste place.. A mix place for adults, younsters and a whole family gettogether

Gunjan Goyal, Bhopal

It's an amazing restaurant, amazing food,best service facilities,the food is really very tasty, here is the best food quality plus different food varieties I really loved the food the location is perfect its beautiful space is amazing I can party here at anytime it's my first experience was just amazing and playfull

Ruel Sam, Bhopal

It's an amazing place with great food and ambience. I love visiting this place and would recommend it to everyone. It's great for hosting parties too. It offers various types of mouth watering cuisines. It's pasteries and beverages are amazing too. It's centrally located too making it really easy for me to visit. The service is perfect and the staff is veryyyyy friendlyyy.playfull

Akshta Telang, Bhopal

The food is amazing and the service is also really good. The vibes are also really positive and I've had a wonderful experience here and will recommend my friends as well

Sidak Kaur, Bhopal

You will get very peaceful and clean environment as well the food is too good... My suggestion is everyone should once try their Amritsari Kulche-Chole

Abhishek, Bhopal

Nice ambiance and amazing baked products...other dishes are also good.. one should try the pastries and cakes . Ambiance ais also very good here.....

Anugya Dhurve, Bhopal

Very nice place to hangout with family and friends especially I love south Indian and pastries, very reasonable price and pocket friendly....kudos to abh staff very polite...

Yogi Tiwari, Bhopal

It's a great place to have good time with family. The food is also great, nicely balanced taste and good services. Do visit and order. All types of variety food is available.

Yash, Bhopal

Great place and the prices are commensurate with the taste. They serve few of the best desserts in town. I would recommend the chocolate truffle pastry, it's just too polite on your taste buds. Overall a good place to hangout.

Rahul Shukla, Bhopal

Ambience is very nice and food was mouthwatering. Especially walnut pie and rainbow pastry every one should try . Good place to hangout with friends.

Gunja, Bhopal

The place is suitable for elderly and not that enticing for theyouths who want everything spicy ,querky and lit .very calm ,cosm and slient place

Sourabh Singh, Bhopal

Nice food and staff. Love the bakery products. The ambiance is good and it is very good for parties and get togethers. Recommended to all the people of Bhopal.

Sana Shekh, Bhopal

4 star only because I like my pastries fresh out of oven. Other wise abh has never disappointed me. There are only few restaurants (budget friendly) which serves food ur tastebuds deserve. Abh is one of them in bhopal. ❤️

Shreya, Bhopal
